subject: Awards, Decorations and Honors
Amateur Athletics
lead_paragraph: The Olympic gold medalist gymnasts Nastia Liukin and Shawn Johnson and the North Carolina basketball star Tyler Hansbrough are among the finalists for the Sullivan Award. The other finalists for the award, which honors the nation’s top amateur athlete, are the Stanford volleyball player Cynthia Barboza and the men’s Olympic 400-meter freestyle relay team. The winner will be announced April 15 in New York.
